content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group 1 to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns > this pattern is part of my 6 different c2c crochet stitches vol 2 /patterns/sources/6-different-c2c-crochet-stitches-vol-2 > ebook save and get the ebook the braided beans is c2c crochet dishcloth pattern this stitch pattern has a lovely texture it s perfect for blankets table runners and dishcloths **you can find the video tutorial for the square version here ** **https //youtu be/ilsxuyfhkh4* crochet c2c is my favorite way of working blankets and washcloths it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go **this pdf pattern can be worked both as a square and as a rectangle ** this c2c stitch is great for a washcloth/dishcloth or a very soft c2c blanket it s repetitive and so easy totally mindless crocheting you can work this stitch with any yarn weight and a suitable hook - skill level - easy - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - the pattern is made with dk #3 yarn and a 4 5mm hook although you can use any yarn with a suitable hook - finished size- 6 5×6 5 16 5x16 5 cm - amount yarn needed 30gr/64m/70yds the pattern is available for free on my blog return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
